content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5) - Status: NOT_CONNECTED
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0) - Status: NOT_CONNECTED
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5) - Status: WORKING
- Pipe groups connecting the offshore pump and boiler, with varying statuses.

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe group (position -9.5, 19.5) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group (position -13.5, 21.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe group (position -11.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 0, 0) - Status: NO_POWER

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0, 0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS
- Furnace (position 5, 5) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to pick up pipes that do not exist
- Ensure that the pipes you are trying to pick up are present at the specified positions before attempting to pick them up.

### Errors when reconnecting boiler to steam engine
- Verify that the positions you are trying to connect are valid and not blocked by other entities. Ensure that the pipes are correctly placed and that there are no obstructions.

### Errors when lab is not receiving power
- Check the connections of the lab to the electricity network. Ensure that all required entities are properly connected and powered.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for any existing entities that may block placement.
